segments.text: I can’t believe how out of control this scene is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water, the kids on the stool, it’s all a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just stands there, and I want to shake her out of her focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second that passes, I feel more furious that she doesn’t notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The moment feels charged with tension as I grapple with my frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for someone to finally notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing how oblivious she is, yet infuriating at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR
